snippet.title: My Special Summer Vacation 2 - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
During the young protagonist’s summer vacation, he is taken care of by his aunt who lives in a rural area.

This is an animated RPG of his time enjoyed getting along with and becoming friends with with his older sister, aunt, and other residents of the town.

My Special Summer Vacation 2 on Kagura Games Store: https://www.kaguragames.com/product/my-special-summer-vacation-2/

My Special Summer Vacation 2 on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2923560/My_Special_Summer_Vacation_2/
